figure.programlisting: EXPLAIN select m.title, role.movie_role from queryex_movie m join queryex_movierole role on role.movie_id = m.id

PLAN SELECT M.TITLE, ROLE.MOVIE_ROLE FROM PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIEROLE ROLE /* PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIEROLE.tableScan */ INNER JOIN PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIE M /* PUBLIC.PRIMARY_KEY_C7B: ID = ROLE.MOVIE_ID */ ON 1=1 WHERE ROLE.MOVIE_ID = M.ID

PLAN SELECT M.TITLE, ROLE.MOVIE_ROLE FROM PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIEROLE ROLE /* PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIEROLE.tableScan */ INNER JOIN PUBLIC.QUERYEX_MOVIE M /* PUBLIC.PRIMARY_KEY_C7B: ID = ROLE.MOVIE_ID */ ON 1=1 WHERE ROLE.MOVIE_ID = M.ID
